name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in **frontend development** and **backend development**, specializing in **JavaScript**, **React**, **HTML**, **CSS**, and various testing libraries. Proven track record of optimizing performance and conducting performance profiling for high-demand applications. Exceptional skills in **cross-team collaboration** and **mentoring**, ensuring consistent communication and knowledge sharing across teams.

Expertise in building and delivering scalable applications across healthcare and financial industries with a strong focus on UI/UX. Proficient in modern **tech stack** including **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Committed to aligning development practices with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, while leveraging cloud technologies on **AWS** and **Azure**. Experienced in MLOps, employing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for AI/ML project implementation.
